pr_title: Reducing LSP server messages on startup.

timeline.bodyText: We don't really need this message at all. It is a heritage from the early attempts to make the Debug Adapter Protocol work.
timeline.author: JaroslavTulach

timeline.bodyText: Great. I wasn't aware of this method. Probably added in newer version of VSCode.
timeline.author: JaroslavTulach

timeline.bodyText: Let's do netbeans.verbose only or netbeans.loglevel, or netbeans.debug. CCing @jisedlac
timeline.author: JaroslavTulach

timeline.bodyText:
Re. "on the console" - I don't think this makes sense from the point of view of VSCode user. The user sees no "console" as far as I can say. "Enables debug messages from the Java Language Server" (in the output tab).
Btw. typo "Lanuage".
